item.title: Creating Histograms of Well Log Data
item.description: Creating Histograms of Well Log Data The accompanying video for this notebook can be found on my YouTube channel at: https://youtu.be/C5USshonqE4 Please check it out, like and subscribe. Introduction Histograms are a great way to explore the distribution of data. They are a commonly used tool within petrophysics for understanding the spread and distribution of data, and for picking key interpretation parameters such as shale or clay volume minimum and maximum values.
